name: CrazyAmbulance
description:
Welcome to CrazyAmbulance!

On the way to the hospital a horrible accident happened! The doors of your ambulance car swung open and you've fallen out, lying on the ambulance bed. In the last moment you've grabbed the tube of your blood transfusion. Not being able to signal yourself to the driver that he should stop, you try not to crash into any cars. Good luck!

Goal: Get as much points as possible, avoid other cars and avoid the guard rail! Collect blood pack crates to live longer.

Controls: A or Left Arrow, D or Right Arrow
